meanings.definition: Covered with a layer of metal
meanings.sent1: The cladded car shone brightly in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The building had a cladded exterior that made it look modern.
meanings.sent3: The cladded robot looked like a shiny knight from the future.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as strong and shiny as cladded armor.
meanings.sent5: The cladded surface reflected the colors of the rainbow.

meanings.definition: Dressed or clothed in a particular way
meanings.sent1: She walked in, cladded in a beautiful gown.
meanings.sent2: The cladded man stood out in his bright red suit.
meanings.sent3: The cladded cat strutted down the street in a tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: His cladded appearance made him the center of attention.
meanings.sent5: The cladded dancer twirled gracefully on the stage.
